sentence: The image is a Chick-fil-A advertisement featuring a cow dressed in business attire, with a blue shirt, tie, and suspenders.
sentence_cn: 图片是 Chick-fil-A 的广告，其中的奶牛身着职业装，身穿蓝色衬衫、系着领带和背带。

sentence: The cow is holding a large notepad with a humorous message that reads, "Memo Frum Tha Boss: Chikin Gives U Bettr Leedership Skilz."
sentence_cn: 这头牛拿着一本大笔记本，上面写着一句幽默的话：“给老板的备忘录：小鸡给你更好的领导力技能。”
words: Memo Frum Tha Boss: Chikin Gives U Bettr Leedership Skilz.

sentence: The cow is also holding a red mug.
sentence_cn: 牛还拿着一个红色的杯子。

sentence: The Chick-fil-A logo is prominently displayed in red on the right side, with "Princeton" written underneath it.
sentence_cn: Chick-fil-A 的红色标志在右侧显眼处显示，下方写着“普林斯顿”。

sentence: Below the logo, there is contact information including an address, "750 Oakvale Road, Princeton, WV," a phone number, "682-282-5540," and a website, "www.chick-fil-a.com/princeton."
sentence_cn: 标志下方有联系信息，包括地址“750 Oakvale Road, Princeton, WV”、电话号码“682-282-5540”和网站“www.chick-fil-a.com/princeton”。

sentence: The image has a red border, and the ID number "1090374074" is at the bottom right corner.
sentence_cn: 图片带有红色边框，右下角有ID号“1090374074”。
